rows.name: intro_text
rows.value: Let’s see how problem solving works in practice.

rows.name: text
rows.value:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2 is coming home from work. 

@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2 (thinking): "Ay my poor feet! I need to sit down a moment and drink a cup of coffee before I start preparing food for everyone."

rows.name: text
rows.value: @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: "@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2! What are you doing? That bread is for dinner! Now there won’t be enough for us all!"

rows.name: text
rows.value:
@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: “Sorry, @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2, I was just hungry. I can explain, you see, there is this guy at school...” 

@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2 (thinking): “Take a Pause… just breathe…”

rows.name: text
rows.value:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: “Just give me a moment. I am tired and now worried about having enough food for dinner.” 

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: “I am sorry, @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2"

rows.name: text
rows.value:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: "Now tell me, why are you so hungry? Did you not eat your lunch at school?” 

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: "That is the problem. There’s a guy at school who bullies me. He says if I do not give my lunch to him every day, he and his friends will hurt me. He makes me so mad!"

value.fullExpression:

rows.name: text
rows.value:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: "I am sorry to hear that but am glad that you told me, @global.w_solve_teen_boy_2. It doesn’t mean that you can eat everybody’s dinner. After we speak, you need to go to the shop to buy some more bread. But first: What do you think we should do about the bully problem?"

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: "Well… I want to just hit him or get him back."

rows.name: text
rows.value:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: "Hmmm… what do you think will happen to you if you do that?"

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: "I don’t know. He is bigger than me so he will probably hurt me more. And I could get into trouble at school and expelled."

value.fullExpression:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: "Hmmm… what do you think will happen to you if you do that?"

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: "I don’t know. He is bigger than me so he will probably hurt me more. And I could get into trouble at school and expelled."

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: "I don’t know. He is bigger than me so he will probably hurt me more. And I could get into trouble at school and expelled."

rows.name: text
rows.value:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: "Yes, that could happen. What could we do instead?"

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: "I guess I could tell the teacher. But then the other kids will call me a tattletale. Maybe you could talk to the teacher?"

value.fullExpression:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: "Yes, that could happen. What could we do instead?"

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: "I guess I could tell the teacher. But then the other kids will call me a tattletale. Maybe you could talk to the teacher?"

rows.name: text
rows.value:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: "That sounds like a better idea. I could also have a word with his parents if you want me to."

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: "Sure. If you think that would help too. Thanks, @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2"

rows.name: text
rows.value:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: "Anything for you, my dear. I will do it first thing after dinner. And you know? If that doesn’t work, we can always try something else together."

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: "Thanks, @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2"

rows.name: text
text
rows.value:
@global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2: "I am sorry to hear that, @global.w_solve_teen_boy_2. Shall I ask your uncle to go talk to his parents? If that does not work, we will try something else!"

@global.w_solve_teen_boy_2: "Yes, thank you @global.w_solve_female_caregiver_2. At least I know you are on my side."
